title: Old Pics Resurface As Chennai Man Severing Head of Sister’s Rapist
subtitle: Chennai Man Severing Head Viral Photo Fact Check: A viral Facebook post shows a collage of three gory pictures, where a man is seen standing with a severed head in his hand.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
WHAT WE FOUND OUT

A simple search for the words 'severed head police station' led us to several news reports on the incident dating back to 29 September.

According to The News Minute, the person in the picture is identified as one Shivaprakash Devaraja from Karnataka's Mandya.

The severed head he carried was of Girish’s, who was incidentally Shivaprakash’s "good friend."

Speaking to the news portal, local police had said that Shivaprakash chopped Girish's head off after the latter spoke ill of his mother, triggering a fight between the two.

He had then walked to the local police station to surrender.
